channel.title: Sports on Will Beiermann Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Sports on Will Beiermann Blog

item.title: Tebow vs Jordan: Who is Baseball's Goat
item.description: Many sports GOAT arguments have become played out at to the point where there’s nothing left to say. Questions about football and basketball’s GOAT have even been banned from this class. There is one GOAT debate however that has been almost entirely ignored by the mainstream sports media. Jordan. Tebow. Who is baseball’s GOAT? library(tidyverse) library(waffle) library(ggalt) library(ggrepel) TebHits<- read_csv("TebowBatting.csv") MJHits<- read_csv("JordanBatting.csv") Hits1994<- read_csv("MinorsBattingLeaders1995") Hits2017<- read_csv("MinorsBattingLeaders2017") GOAT obviously is the wrong word here, but the question is an interesting one.
